H0.text: who owns the delano hotel in las vegas. Caesars Entertainment

H1.text: who owns the delano hotel in las vegas. Wynn Resorts

H2.text: who owns the delano hotel in las vegas. Las Vegas Sands

H3.text: who owns the delano hotel in las vegas. MGM Resorts International

A4.text: owner MGM Resorts International announced a partnership with Morgans Hotel Group to rebrand the hotel as Delano Las Vegas

A5.text: Through the deal, MGM would manage the hotel under a licensing agreement with Morgans Hotel Group, which owned the Delano brand
